name: skills (expo)
description: [项目级] A collection of AI agent skills for working with Expo projects and Expo Application Services。来源: https://github.com/expo/skills

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A collection of AI agent skills for working with Expo projects and Expo Application Services

来源: https://github.com/expo/skills
语言: JavaScript
Stars: 1098

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: We primarily use [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code) at Expo, skills are fine-tuned for Opus models. But you can use these skills with any AI agent.

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CLAUDE.md
CONTRIBUTING.md
LICENSE
README.md
plugins
plugins/expo-app-design
plugins/expo-deployment
plugins/upgrading-expo

name: skills/plugins 模块
description: [模块级] skills 项目的 plugins 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/expo/skills

genes.title: plugins 模块说明
genes.content:
模块路径: plugins/
类型: source
文件数: 65

包含文件:
- plugins/expo-app-design
- plugins/expo-app-design/.claude-plugin
- plugins/expo-app-design/.claude-plugin/plugin.json
- plugins/expo-app-design/README.md
- plugins/expo-app-design/skills
- plugins/expo-app-design/skills/building-native-ui
- plugins/expo-app-design/skills/building-native-ui/SKILL.md
- plugins/expo-app-design/skills/building-native-ui/references
- plugins/expo-app-design/skills/building-native-ui/references/animations.md
- plugins/expo-app-design/skills/building-native-ui/references/controls.md
